mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CHATROOM(CHATROOMNAME, CHATCODE) VALUES( #{chatRoomName}, (SELECT CHATCODE FROM CHATCODE WHERE CHATTYPE='GROUP'))
INSERT INTO CHATUSERS(CHATSEQ, MAIL) VALUES( (SELECT CHATSEQ FROM CHATROOM WHERE CHATROOMNAME=#{newChatRoomName}), (SELECT MAIL FROM USER WHERE MAIL=#{mail}));
mapper.select: SELECT CHATSEQ FROM CHATROOM WHERE CHATROOMNAME=#{chatRoomName}
SELECT * FROM CHATROOM CR LEFT OUTER JOIN CHATUSERS CU ON CR.CHATSEQ = CU.CHATSEQ WHERE MAIL=#{mail} AND CR.CHATCODE=3 ORDER BY CR.CHATSEQ DESC
